channel.title: Globular Clusters on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Globular Clusters on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: Dynamics of Multiple Stellar Populations in Old Globular clusters
item.description: The presence and origin of Multiple stellar populations in Globular Clusters is one of the greatest mysteries of modern astrophysics.

item.title: GALFOR
item.description: GALFOR is an ERC funded project of Galactic archaeology (ERC-2016-STG, 716082) to address such hot topics of modern astrophysics
